name: SnapBack Prototype
description:
SnapBack is a very early and rough prototype of a game idea I had after being inspired by One More Line from SMG Studios.

Your enemies are your friends! Running into the red blocks will grant points, but send you flying back to the death zone. You can also get points if you see the Death Zone. 

Strategically bounce around to earn more points, while trying to play dangerously close to the Death Zone for maximum points!
